title: Park Han Byul to show fans her lifestyle in new solo variety show | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Park Han Byul to show fans her lifestyle in new solo variety show By beansss 2 minutes ago 299 0 0 0 SEE ALSO: [MVP OP-ED] - The death of a K-Pop generation Upcoming JTBC2 show ' Girl in Training ' goes by the concept of a star who will undergo changes in their lifestyle in order to become a more well-rounded woman, whether it be in the aspect of fashion, beauty, health, living, etc. On the show, Park Han Byul will be demonstrating her own beauty tips, as well as working on some of her own flaws, all the while displaying her real, human side on the camera. This will be Park Han Byul's first solo variety show in 15 years since her debut, and will be broadcast through JTBC2 beginning this March.
